Backend

Class BaseNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • Backend.BaseNode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusterBroker, Node, PingPongNode, StressTestNode

    public abstract class BaseNode
extends java.lang.Object
    The superclass used for all the entities inside the simulation.

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • nodeId

        private long nodeId

      • inbox

        private java.util.concurrent.PriorityBlockingQueue<BaseMessage> inbox
        The queue used for delivering messages. Because this may be run inside a parallel environment, the queue should support parallel insertion and serial extraction. To keep the simulation consistent, the extraction must be done in the order of the receive-timestamps.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseNode

        public BaseNode(long nodeId)

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(long timestamp)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        This function is called by the SimulationManager to notify the node that it has messages in its inbox that must be delivered
        Parameters:
        timestamp - The current timestamp. All the messages with the same timestamp will be processed in a call.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • processMessage

        public abstract void processMessage(BaseMessage msg)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The function where a single message is processed. Must be implemented in subclasses.
        Parameters:
        msg - The received message
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • push

        public void push(BaseMessage msg)

        public void setNodeId(long nodeId)
